title: How can we get more rune pages or is that not a thing anymore
body: So I recently bought a 25 dollar league riot card and got online to purchase some rune pages because you only start with two and more have to be bought unlike master pages but I have searched through the whole shop and everywhere I looked there was nothing that allowed me to buy more rune pages someone please help. Thankyou.

replies.body:
Rune pages can be found under the *Gameplay* tab in the store, just be sure your sorting parameters on the left says *Show All* under *Tier*. Below is a screenshot showing what I mean.

https://imgur.com/a/Voa4j

Let me know if this helped!
